name: Les aventures du Ka: Le Talisman d'Osiris
overview:
Following the discovery of hieroglyphs, you are informed of the existence of the talisman of Osiris, a sacred ornament which legend claims that it was offered by the gods to the pharaohs to provide them with magic power. Teammate of Special Agent KA, you must find the talisman before enemies can take it. And "Do not forget to appease the anger of the gods by approaching the light" ...

Osiris is the Greek name for a god from Egyptian mythology. He is the god of the dead and the guarantor of the survival of the deceased in the underworld. Its symbol is the Djed pillar, its attributes are the false beard, the Heka scepter, the Nékhekh flabellum and the Atef crown.
